Class QueueBatch

java.lang.Object
arc.graphics.g2d.Batch

arc.graphics.g2d.SortedSpriteBatch
arc.graphics.g2d.QueueBatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Disposable
public class QueueBatch
extends SortedSpriteBatch
Stores sprites and draws them with a delay.
